Reviews.Title: recommend this product
Reviews.Author: Jun Shen
Reviews.Content: I love the touchscreen so much, and it is so easy to use and also convinient. Lightweight is also attractive for me, so I can carry it everywhere easily.

Reviews.Title: Recommend this laptop
Reviews.Author: vivian ren
Reviews.Content: Highly recommend this laptop, pretty decent for pro use.Light-weight, small enough for hand using, High resolution touch screen make it much fun to use it as a touchpadThe latest CPU brings a high performance, super fast and perfectly match the on-going lifestyle.The battery life surprised me, I can go many hours without charge.

Reviews.Title: It's a good computer !
Reviews.Author: Can Sun
Reviews.Content: Comparing with other brand laptops I used before, like Acer,  Toshiba,  I prefer  Dell XPS,  better quality, reasonable price, I would recommend to my friends.

Reviews.Title: Love this ultrabook
Reviews.Author: qing
Reviews.Content: I can not say how much I love this laptop. Good quality, easy to catch with me, shipping fast and most of all, it is much cheaper than other note book with similar specification. I love it!

Reviews.Title: my first convertible laptop
Reviews.Author: Michelle Li
Reviews.Content: my first convertible laptop. i really like the convertible function. really cool.  very easy to use.and good quality i really enjoy using it.

Reviews.Title: Pretty good laptop
Reviews.Author: Peng Xu
Reviews.Content: Beautiful laptop with all the features built in together. Portable to bring anywhere with me with only 3 pounds. And the touchscreen is awesome!

Reviews.Title: Perfect Lappy
Reviews.Author: Ding
Reviews.Content: Love this one. Fashion, power and lightness together in one.Very easy to change from laptop to tablet setting. Just cannot put it down.

Reviews.Title: Not good
Reviews.Author: Kevin An
Reviews.Content: I order new notebook, It came with used notebook with scratched look like refurbished. I will return notebookMake sure it new before you buying.

ProductInfo.Features:
Intel i5-3437U Processor (3M Cache, up to 2.9 GHz), 4 GB DDR3L SDRAM, 256 GB Solid-State Drive,
12.5 Inch (1920x1080) FHD Touchscreen
Intel HD Graphics 4000, 1.3MP webcam; 1280 x 1024 pixels with dual digital-array digital microphones
Carbon Fiber, light weight, 6 cell battery
Windows 8 free upgrade to Windows 8.1
ProductInfo.Name: Dell XPS 12 12.5-Inch Convertible 2-in-1 Touchscreen Ultrabook /i5-3437U/4 GB RAM/256 GB SSD
